site_name: 64 Barrons ChaseRichmond Upon ThamesTW10 5BZ
description: Erection of single storey detached outbuilding in rear garden for use as gym
decision_conditions: By virtue of its siting, size and design, the proposed outbuilding would appear overly large and out of keeping with the prevailing character of the area. The proposal would therefore have a harmful impact to the character and appearance of the host dwelling and the surrounding area, contrary to the National Planning Policy Framework (2019), Policies CS8 and DM10 of the Council's adopted Core Strategy (2012) and Paragraph 4.30 of the Council's Residential Design Supplementary Planning Document (2013).

The assessment of this application is based on measurements taken from the submitted drawings / plans. If it transpires that the drawings / plans submitted are incorrect this would nullify the validity of this decision and you are advised to submit a fresh application with the correct information / drawings.

Please submit a copy of an Ordnance Survey based site location plan scaled 1:1250 with the application site outlined in red and adjoining land owned by applicant in blue, showing at least two road frontages and a North point.The submitted location plan is in 1:150 scale.
